name: New Zealand Research Information System (NZRIS) Data Specifications Application Decision
maintainer: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Definition: The asset poll allocated all requested resources allocated
The asset pool allocated some of the requested resources
The asset pool declined to allocate resources
The application did not meet eligibility criteria and could not be allocated resources
The applicant withdrew the application for resources prior to completion of the allocation process
The applicant has not supplied sufficient information to progress with the application
A decision not otherwise specified in this code set
